   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Syndat's documentation!
==================================
**Syndat** is a python-based code used to synthesize experimental neutron cross section data at incident neutron energies corresponding to the resolved resonance range.



.. toctree::
   :caption: Contents:

   usage
   source_api/index
